1.0.2.name: wordpress/demomentsomtres-language
1.0.2.description: DeMomentSomTres Language allows to have different instances of a blog using different languages on a network installation. It includes a widget to change to initial home page in another language. Every post contains a link to any of its translation in an area below the title and content metadata.
